abilities.name: Storm Call
about: Sets a marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers encounter has cast

abilities.name: Blade Blossom
about: Creates knives on the ground which fly upwards after a short delay

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
about: Fires a slow-moving projectile that periodically damages enemies in an area around it with bolts of lightning

abilities.name: Cleave
about: Swings weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc, damaging enemies in an area in front of them

abilities.name: Mortar
about: Fires projectile that does damage on impact and when the projectile explodes
